description: Construction of a new salt shed to replace the existing one on the Toad River Maintenance Yard.
full_summary:
### Invitation to Qualify for Toad River Salt Shed Replacement - Phase 1
#### Contract Details

* **Contract Title (English):** EZ899-241395 Toad River Salt Shed Replacement - Phase 1
* **Contract Title (French):** EZ899-241395 Remplacement du hangar à sel de Toad River - Phase 1
* **Reference Number:** WS4344970773-Doc4344972795
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4344970773
* **Publication Date:** December 15, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 3, 2024 at 14:00
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Contract Overview

Public Services and Procurement Canada invites qualified contractors to submit their interest in designing and constructing a new salt shed at the Toad River Maintenance Yard in British Columbia. This is the first phase of a two-phase process. The first phase will assess the qualifications of all bidders, and the second phase will involve inviting qualified bidders to submit a financial bid based on the project specifications and drawings.

#### Key Dates

* **Publication Date:** December 15, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 3, 2024 at 14:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** Not Applicable

#### Contact Information

For any inquiries, please contact:

* **Michaela Costa (SPAC/PSPC)**
* **Email:** michaela.costa@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (Not Applicable)

#### Notice URL

Access the Invitation to Qualify document at:

* **https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18285125?extsite=MTgyODUxMjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==**

#### UNSPSC Codes

This contract pertains to the following categories:

* Land and soil preparation and management and protection
* Land and soil protection
* Building and Facility Construction and Maintenance Services
* Nonresidential building construction services
* Earthmoving services
* Demolition services
* Building site preparation services
* Professional engineering services
* Prefabricated buildings and structures

#### Notice Type

This is an Invitation to Qualify solicitation, which falls under the Oversight and Classification of Good and Services (CNST). The selection method is the lowest price. No trade agreements apply
